column4: Hi, I successfully booted Ubuntu CD on my HP Pavilion. I get all the way to install alongside windows. However after that it tells me to remove all installation media and press enter. However then after I hit enter it reboots into windows...what's wrong?
ubuntu live cd boots to a gui. but there also is parted which works in console. not sure if it's on the ubuntu cd tho
that's not what he asked. do you have backups of all important files?
